UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the VORTEX application.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

gatekeeperPassed.description: Whether the user has passed the initial gatekeeper modal.

isBlocked.description: Whether the user is blocked from using the application.

Stats.title: Stats
Stats.description: Represents statistical data for the application.

Campaign.title: Campaign
Campaign.description: Represents a user-created campaign to gain followers.

userId.description: The UID of the user who created the campaign.

username.description: The username for the social media profile.

url.description: The URL of the social media profile.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the avatar for the profile.

reward.description: The number of coins rewarded for one follow.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the campaign was created.

PurchaseVerification.title: PurchaseVerification
PurchaseVerification.description: Represents a manual purchase verification request.

userId.description: The UID of the user who made the purchase.

packageId.description: The ID of the coin package purchased (e.g., 'basic', 'premium').

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the verification request was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data. The 'userId' parameter corresponds to the authenticated user's UID, ensuring path-based ownership.

/stats/users.description: Stores the total count of registered users.

/campaigns/{campaignId}.description: Stores individual, single-claim campaigns created by users. Each document represents one potential follow.

/purchase_verifications/{verificationId}.description: Stores manual purchase verification requests. Only administrators should have write access to change the status.
